Module no.ntnu.idatt1002
Package no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao

Interface SettlementDAO

All Superinterfaces:
DAO<Settlement,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlSettlementDAO
public interface SettlementDAO extends DAO<Settlement,Long>
This interface defines methods to interact with settlements and settlement related tasks.

    • create

      Settlement create(String name, long userId)
      Creates a new settlement with the specified name and creator.
      Parameters:
      name - the settlement name
      userId - the ID of the user who creates the settlement
      Returns:
      a new settlement

      Deletes a settlement specified by the ID.
      Parameters:
      settlementId - the settlement ID

      Finds all settlements that a user is part of.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a list of settlements
